title: Description
placeholder: Update DS_SPR_BILLING_ACCOUNT to add field sourced from x source of table y.
subtext: Description (make it as descriptive as possible):

title: Defect
subtext: Defect (if there is an INC or JID related):

title: ACE
subtext: Is it an ACE mapping issue (in which case it will be MIRA or MIRMA):

title: PowerBi
subtext: Is there Power BI impact (in which case the LOE should cover only backend work, and timeline refers only to backend work):

title: Sprint
subtext: Sprint Target for development (in which sprint you think that you will be ready to develop, SP7/SP8/etc.):

title: RTarget
subtext: Release Target (Mar/Apr/etc. Can be the release where the sprint above goes to Production, or an earlier one if there is a request for down porting and feasibility to do it):

title: EBD
subtext: If the MIR is going to be tested separate from the sprint, indicate the EBD:

title: ENV
subtext: If the MIR is going to be tested separate from the sprint, indicate on which environment:

title: Comment
placeholder: Comments relevant to the MIR/CR request
subtext: Comment (if any, to be added to Remarks in the tracker):

title: BUS
subtext: Do we have all the business logic to support the change:

title: Access
subtext: Do we have all required data, table access, etc.:

title: Review
subtext: Is there need for grooming sessions with business:

title: LOE
subtext: If there is enough information, what is the LOE (can be changed later):

title: sign-off
subtext: Is there need (in your opinion) to submit formal design for sign-off?:
